name: MANDALA
description: Vector illustration. Started doing Graffiti in Rio in 2000. His work consists in create an own identity. A character that populates the urban space in dialogue with the people of the city. The continuity of this work led him to create a series of variations, in different media, and turns it in a classic character in the Rio urban scene. Ig: @ mga021 Twitter: @madruga_enc  antihorario.com.br
